name: Amazon S3 Opportunity-Inbound-Processed-Results Folder - Slack
description:
**Trigger:** It will run when  new file dumped into the opportunity-inbound-processed-results-archive folder.

**Description:** We would like for R7 users to be notified when certain variables are updated on their Opportunities. This will relate to work we are doing with Amazon Partner Network (APN) for joint deals, where the notification of our reps on updates is time sensitive. 
This will ensure that our opportunity owners and aws-opps channel are receiving notifications when their opportunity data is being updated

**Actions:** Opportunity Owners  and aws-Opps channel should be notified via slack when a change is made to ‘Amazon Partner Network Request’

code.name: new_file

extended_input_schema.name: prefix
extended_input_schema.label: Folder path
extended_input_schema.hint: Folder (and all subfolders) to monitor for new files and folders. If left blank, selected bucket (all folders in the bucket or restricted folder if defined) will be monitored. To monitor a subfolder, define full path, e.g. folder 1/subfolder 1

extended_input_schema.name: chunk_size
extended_input_schema.label: Download chunk size in kilobytes
extended_input_schema.hint: Download this many kilobytes at a time. Default is 1024 (1MB), minimum is 32 (KB)

input.sample_document:
{
    "success": "ALL",
    "spmsId": "46853",
    "isApiError": false,
    "inboundApiResults": [{
        "warnings": null,
        "partnerCrmUniqueIdentifier": "UP156456",
        "isSuccess": true,
        "errors":  null,
        "apnCrmUniqueIdentifier": "O516990"
    }],
    "error": null,
    "fileName": "opportunity-inbound/opportunity-2020-11-17T12:39:47.142524-05:00.json",
    "fileApnProcessedDT": "2020-11-17T17:39:52.440Z",
    "apiErrors": null
}

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Amazon partner network requests using SOQL query WHERE clause
block.description: Search Amazon partner network requests using SOQL query WHERE clause in Salesforce

input.field_list:
Id
Name
APNCRMUniqueIdentifier__c
AccountName__c
PublishingFailureReason__c
PublishingStatus__c
LastModifiedDate
LastPublishedOn__c

extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.
